price: Mu by’ukuri (Intumwa Muhamadi) yabonye bimwe mu bitangaza bihambaye bya Nyagasani wayo.
arabic: لَقَدۡ رَأَىٰ مِنۡ ءَايَٰتِ رَبِّهِ ٱلۡكُبۡرَىٰٓ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: laqad raā min āyāti rabbihi al-kub'rā
